events.message: The customer has filed a claim due to a car accident involving a rear-end collision at an intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial accident report provided by the customer.
An insurance agent was assigned to manage the claim and to coordinate with the customer for further details.
The claim acknowledgement was sent to the customer promptly, confirming receipt and next steps in the process.
Additional documents including police report, photos of vehicle damage, and repair estimates were requested from the customer.
The customer submitted all requested documents in a timely manner, including the official police report and vehicle repair bills.
The internal investigation team has started reviewing the submitted evidence, assessing the collision details and liability.
The investigation was completed confirming fault in the accident as described, and all necessary evidence was validated.
A settlement offer covering the vehicle repairs and associated costs was proposed to the customer for their review.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement proposal and confirmed acceptance of the terms offered.
Based on customer acceptance and investigation results, the claim was officially approved for payment processing.
Payment for the approved claim was issued directly to the repair shop and the customer was notified accordingly.
The claim was formally closed after confirming all payments were received and the customer's vehicle was repaired.
